cellLineName.description: The cell line name as found in the Cell Line Ontology. Must be a child term of 'immortal cell line cell'.
cellLineName.title: Name

cellLineLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the  batch of cells used in the experiment.
cellLineLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

cellLineTissue.description: Tissue from which the cell line was derived, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, Brenda Tissue Ontology, or UBERON. Must be a child term of 'Tissue (NCIT)', 'tissues, cell types, and enzyme sources (BTO), or tissue (UBERON)'.
cellLineTissue.title: Tissue of Origin

cellLineOrgan.description: Organ from which the cell line was derived, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, UBERON, or FMA. Must be a child term of 'organ'.
cellLineOrgan.title: Organ of Origin

cellLineSpecies.description: Species from which the cell line was derived, with name chosen from the NCBI Taxonomy. Must be a child term of 'cellular organisms'.
cellLineSpecies.title: Species of Origin

cellLineDisease.description: If the cell line came from a diseased tissue, the disease name must be taken from the Disease Ontology. Must be a child term of 'disease'. Leave blank if the origin tissue or cells were not diseased.
cellLineDisease.title: Disease

crisprKnockoutName.description: The primary name of the CRISPR reagent.
crisprKnockoutName.title: Name

crisprKnockoutLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of CRISPR reagent used in the experiment.
crisprKnockoutLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSymbol.description: The HGNC (human), MGI (mouse), RGD (rat), or ZFIN (zebrafish) symbol of the gene knocked out by CRISPR for knockout, or VGNC gene symbols for other vertebrate species.
crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSymbol.title: Target Gene Symbol

crisprKnockoutTargetGeneId.description: The NCBI Entrez Gene ID for the gene knocked out by CRISPR.
crisprKnockoutTargetGeneId.title: NCBI Entrez ID for Target Gene

crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSpecies.description: The species of the target locus, with name chosen from the NCBI Taxonomy. Must be a child term of 'cellular organisms'.
crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSpecies.title: Target Gene Species

crisprKnockoutDuration.description: Amount of time the experimental system was exposed to the CRISPR reagent.
crisprKnockoutDuration.title: Duration

crisprKnockoutDurationUnits.description: Time units of exposure (e.g. second, minute, hour). Name of unit must be chosen from the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'time unit'.
crisprKnockoutDurationUnits.title: Duration Units

primaryCellName.description: Name of the type of cells, with the name chosen from the Cell Ontology (CL). Must be a child term of 'cell'.
primaryCellName.title: Name

primaryCellLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the  batch of cells used in the experiment
primaryCellLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

primaryCellTissue.description: Tissue from which the cells were extracted, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, Brenda Tissue Ontology, or UBERON. Must be a child term of 'Tissue (NCIT)', 'tissues, cell types, and enzyme sources (BTO), or tissue (UBERON)'.
primaryCellTissue.title: Tissue of Origin

primaryCellOrgan.description: Organ from which the cells were extracted, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, UBERON, or FMA. Must be a child term of 'organ'.
primaryCellOrgan.title: Organ of Origin

primaryCellSpecies.description: Species from which the cells were extracted, with name chosen from the NCBI Taxonomy. Must be a child term of 'cellular organisms'.
primaryCellSpecies.title: Species of Origin

primaryCellDisease.description: If the cells are diseased, the disease name must be taken from the Disease Ontology. Must be a child term of 'disease'. Leave blank if the cells were not diseased when obtained from the donor.
primaryCellDisease.title: Disease

proteinName.description: The primary name of the protein.

proteinUniProtId.description: The UniProt ID of the specific protein and, if relevant, isoform.

proteinConcentration.description: Concentration of protein that the experimental system was exposed to.

proteinConcentrationUnits.description: Concentration units of exposure (e.g. nanomolar, micromolar, millimolar). Name of unit must be chosen from the Experimental Factor Ontology (EFO) or the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'concentration unit'.
proteinConcentrationUnits.title: Concentration Units

proteinDuration.description: Amount of time the experimental system was exposed to the protein.
proteinDuration.title: Duration

proteinDurationUnits.description: Time units of exposure (e.g. second, minute, hour). Name of unit must be chosen from the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'time unit'.

smallMoleculeConcentrationUnits.description: Concentration units of exposure (e.g. nanomolar, micromolar, millimolar). Name of unit must be chosen from the Experimental Factor Ontology (EFO) or the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'concentration unit'.

smallMoleculeDuration.description: Amount of time the experimental system was exposed to the small molecule.

smallMoleculeDurationUnits.title: Duration Units
